title: America IS Socialist? 7.9.21

description:
In episode 947, Jack and Miles are joined by Bubble Trouble hosts Richard Kramer and Will Page to discuss markets, socialism, how business can screw you, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Tarzan Economics: Eight Principles for Pivoting through Disruption
